subtitle: Minced lamb covered with a layer of spinach and topped with French bread and cheese.

method.text: Dry fry the mince with the onion and pepper for about 5-6 min or until the onion is soft.

Stir in the spices, seasoning and tomatoes. Cook for 15-20 min, stirring occasionally, until well mixed. Mix the flour with the water until smooth. Pour into the pan. Bring to the boil then simmer for 2-3 min until thickened.
Meanwhile, heat the spinach in a pan for 2-3 min, stirring constantly, until piping hot.
Spoon the mince mixture into the base of an ovenproof 1 <sup>2</sup>/<sub>5</sub> litre (2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> pt) dish. Spread the spinach over the mince mixture.
Spread the pizza topping or tomato puree over the bread slices. Sprinkle over the cheese. Arrange around the edge of the dish.
Place the dish under a medium preheated grill. Cook for about 4-5 min or until piping hot and golden brown.

title: Cheesy mince florentine
